explains: adj. 数字的，用数字表示的

sentences.en: Numerical increases are used as quantifiable indicators of heightened interest in the new stimulus.
sentences.cn: 数值的增长被用来作为显示新型激励下增长利益的量化指标。

sentences.en: DNS refers to the Domain Name System, which is a directory that connects names to numerical Internet addresses.
sentences.cn: DNS 指的是域名系统，它是一个目录，将名称连接到数字互联网地址。

sentences.en: As the chapters will illustrate, mathematics is not restricted to the analytical and numerical; intuition plays a significant role.
sentences.cn: 正如这几章将要论述的，数学并不局限于解析和数值；直觉起着重要的作用。
